mapper.select: select count(*) as amount from tbl_marketing_activities as act inner join tbl_user as owner on act.ownerId = owner.id inner join tbl_user as createBy on act.createById = createBy.id left join tbl_user as editBy on act.editById = editBy.id

select act.id, act.name, act.startDate, act.endDate, act.cost, act.ownerId, owner.name as ownerName, act.createById, createBy.name as createByName, act.editById, editBy.name as editByName from tbl_marketing_activities as act inner join tbl_user as owner on act.ownerId = owner.id inner join tbl_user as createBy on act.createById = createBy.id left join tbl_user as editBy on act.editById = editBy.id order by act.name limit #{index},#{offset}

select act.id, act.name, act.description, act.startDate, act.endDate, act.cost, act.ownerId, owner.name as ownerName, act.createById, createBy.name as createByName, act.createTime, act.editById, editBy.name as editByName, act.editTime from tbl_marketing_activities as act inner join tbl_user as owner on act.ownerId = owner.id inner join tbl_user as createBy on act.createById = createBy.id left join tbl_user as editBy on act.editById = editBy.id where act.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_marketing_activities (id, ownerId, name, startDate, endDate, cost, description, createById, createTime) values (#{id}, #{ownerId}, #{name}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{cost}, #{description}, #{createById}, #{createTime})
